name: NICK OF TIME (Gorethumb, tornado cub, JeffersonToal)
name_original: NICK OF TIME (Gorethumb, tornado cub, JeffersonToal)
description:
CONTROLS

ARROW KEYS: MOVE LEFT AND RIGHT

SPACE KEY: JUMP

[X] KEY: PLACE TIMEBLOCK

[R] KEY: RESET LEVEL

[E] KEY: KEEP PLAYING TO FIND OUT!

When Professor Nick finds himself lost in spacetime, he must build his way out one block at a time! But when it comes to matters of space and time, you can't add one without taking away from the other...

CREDITS

ART & PROGRAMMING: GORETHUMB https://viigames.itch.io/
MUSIC & SFX: TORNADO CUB https://tornadocub.itch.io/
NARRATIVE & LEVEL DESIGN: JEFFERSON TOAL https://jeffersontoal.itch.io/
